sourcesContent:
<template>
       <GGanttChart :chart-start="chartStart" :chart-end="chartEnd">
         <GGanttRow
           v-for="product in products"
           :key="product.SKU"
           :label="product.Name"
           :bars="[
             {
               barStart: product.SellingDate,
               barEnd: product.SellingDate
             }
           ]"
         />
       </GGanttChart>
     </template>
     
     <script>
     import { ref } from 'vue';
     import { GGanttChart, GGanttRow } from '@infectoone/vue-ganttastic';
     
     export default {
      name:'GanttAstic',
       components: {
         GGanttChart,
         GGanttRow,
       },
       setup() {
         const chartStart = ref(new Date('2024-01-01'));
         const chartEnd = ref(new Date('2024-12-31'));
         const products = ref([
           {
             SKU: '12345',
             Name: 'Product A',
             SellingDate: new Date('2024-05-15'),
           },
         ]);
     
         return { chartStart, chartEnd, products };
       },
     };
     </script>
